author: IGN
description:
Check out League of Legends: The Story So Far trailer and revisit all the major events that lead to the cinematic story finale of 2025.

#IGN #gaming
title: League of Legends - Official The Story So Far: 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Theatrical Trailer for Truth & Treason, a World War 2 historical drama thriller film distributed by Angel Studios and Kaleidoscope Pictures. Truth & Treason is in select theaters on October 17.

As World War II rages, a teenage boy in Germany is forced to confront a terrible truth—loyalty to his country now means loyalty to a lie. When his trusted bishop urges obedience to the Nazi regime, he begins to question everything. And after his Jewish friend is taken away, he secretly listens to banned radio broadcasts and launches a resistance, exposing the truth. But in a nation ruled by fear, defiance comes at a cost—and as the regime closes in, he must decide what it truly means to be a good German.

Truth & Treason stars Ewan Horrocks, Rupert Evans, Ferdinand McKay, Daf Thomas, Nye Occomore, Joanna Christie, Sean Mahon, Sylvie Varcoe, and more. The film is directed by Matt Whitaker and written by Ethan Vincent and Matt Whitaker.

Truth & Treason is in select theaters o
title: Truth & Treason - Official Theatrical Trailer (2025) Ewan Horrocks, Rupert Evans, Ferdinand McKay

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Season 1 Cinematic Intro Trailer for Battlefield 6, the latest addition to the first-person multiplayer shooter franchise developed by DICE, EA, and Battlefield Studios. An explosion rattles Fort Lyndon, a government testing ground hiding secrets to die for. An armada of Rogue Operators, veiled by the chaos, seize this moment to descend and wreak havoc. It’s up to your squad to stop them. Season 1 for Battlefield 6 is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Season 1 Intro Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Official Trailer for Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember, a personal documentary pertaining to dementia and Alzheimer’s disease distributed by National Geographic. Follow the story behind Chris Hemsworth and his father in Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember, streaming on November 24 on Disney+ and Hulu. 

In this touching and uplifting journey, inspired by Craig’s recent diagnosis, Chris and his father set out on their motorcycles on a “road trip back in time,” visiting people and places from their shared past, from suburban Melbourne to the wild expanses of Australia’s Northern Territories, to explore the profound science of social connection. Through the stunning, vast landscapes of Australia, Chris and Craig's journey becomes a funny and moving exploration of a father and son's bond, proving that love, community, and shared experience can be potent medicine. 

Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember is streaming on November 24 on Disney+ and Hulu.
title: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember - Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
To find redemption, you’ll have to break through. Check out the Icefall trailer for this upcoming movie starring Danny Huston (The Aviator), Joel Kinnaman (The Killing, The Suicide Squad), Graham Greene (The Green Mile), Frida Gustavsson (Vikings: Valhalla), and DeVaughn Nixon (Terminator 2: Judgment Day).

A young Indigenous game warden arrests a notorious poacher, only to learn he knows the location of a plane full of cash that crashed in a frozen lake. When criminals and corrupt cops close in, the unlikely pair must fight to survive and escape across the melting ice.


Icefall is written by Steve Isles and George Mahaffey. It is directed by Stefan Ruzowitzky (The Counterfeiters). 

Icefall will be available on digital & on demand on November 4, 2025.
title: Icefall - Official Trailer (2025) Danny Huston, Joel Kinnaman

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Maru Character Trailer for Destiny: Rising, a sci-fi mobile RPG developed by NetEase Games. Players can learn more about Maru, who, jaded by the Dark Age's greed, is now ready to start her own voyage exploring what lies beyond the Earth. Get a look at some lore and gameplay for Maru from Destiny: Rising, available now for iOS and Android.

#IGN #gaming
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Maru Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fortnite Battle Royale has crashed into Springfield! Drop into Springfield and explore iconic Simpsons locations including The Simpson’s house on Evergreen Terrace, the Springfield Nuclear Plant, Burns Manor, and much, much more. The 80-player Springfield Island features a fast-paced, back-to-basics Battle Royale experience straight from the minds behind The Simpsons. Giant donuts will fall from the sky and angry clones will roam the streets, but don’t worry, Homer Simpson is in charge. Check out Delulu for new Simpsons weapons during the Season and prepare for a month of gags, gadgets, and Simpsons animated shorts!
Fortnite x The Simpsons event runs from November 1 at 4:30 PM ET through November 2 at 11:59 PM ET.
title: Fortnite x The Simpsons - Official Welcome to Springfield Trailer

author: IGN
description: The Simpsons have finally arrived in Fortnite! To celebrate, let's look back at the dozens of Simpsons video games leading up to this and find out which ones were great and which ones were not so great! Doh!
title: The Best, Worst, and Weirdest Simpsons Games

author: IGN
description:
Get your first proper look at gameplay from Zeverland, the upcoming co-op multiplayer survival/crafting game set on a massive map whose adorable Funko Pop-y looks belie its very dark and violent zombie-battling gameplay. Oh, and if you get bitten and turned into a zombie, the game doesn't end...

Wishlist Zeverland on Steam and sign up for the first playtest if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3371050/Zeverland/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Zeverland: Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: It’s been five years since Animal Crossing: New Horizons first launched, and a lot has changed! From Brewster’s café and Happy Home Paradise to the upcoming Version 3.0 update and Switch 2 Edition, here’s everything that’s been added since launch — and what’s still to come.
title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons - Every Major Update Added Since Launch
